channel.title: Louder Than Words | Creative Talks with John Bonini
channel.description: Louder Than Words tells the stories of personal and professional growth from some of the most interesting people in business, art, entrepreneurship, and more.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Louder Than Words tells the stories of personal a…
channel.itunes:author: John Bonini

item.title: Lindsay Pettingill: Airbnb's 4 Principles For Marketing Experimentation
item.itunes:author: John Bonini
item.itunes:summary: Airbnb runs about 700 experiments in a given week. Here, I chat with data scientist Linsday Pettingill on the culture and principles that allow their team to move so quickly and efficiently, and how others people can transpose these ideas to their own work.
item.itunes:subtitle: Airbnb runs about 700 experiments in a given week…
item.description: Airbnb runs about 700 experiments in a given week. Here, I chat with data scientist Linsday Pettingill on the culture and principles that allow their team to move so quickly and efficiently, and how others people can transpose these ideas to their own work.

item.title: Sean Ellis & Morgan Brown: How Successful Companies Drive Extraordinary Growth
item.itunes:author: John Bonini
item.itunes:summary:
What do companies like Facebook, Dropbox, Airbnb, Pinterest (and others!) all have in common? Not just a great product, but a methodical, measured approach to driving extraordinary growth.
In this episode, Sean Ellis and Morgan Brown (founders of GrowthHackers.com) unpack the principles behind these methods.
item.itunes:subtitle: What do companies like Facebook, Dropbox, Airbnb,…
item.description:
What do companies like Facebook, Dropbox, Airbnb, Pinterest (and others!) all have in common? Not just a great product, but a methodical, measured approach to driving extraordinary growth.
In this episode, Sean Ellis and Morgan Brown (founders of GrowthHackers.com) unpack the principles behind these methods.

item.title: Scott Monty: The Moves That Helped Change Ford Motor Company's Image
item.itunes:author: John Bonini
item.itunes:summary: Scott Monty, former head of social media at Ford Motor Company, talks about his decision to join Ford in 2008 and the specifics of what went into the social and branding strategies that helped turn the company’s image around.

item.description: Scott Monty, former head of social media at Ford Motor Company, talks about his decision to join Ford in 2008 and the specifics of what went into the social and branding strategies that helped turn the company’s image around.

item.title: Pamela Vaughan: How the HubSpot Blog Drives 2 Million Monthly Views
item.itunes:author: John Bonini
item.itunes:summary:
The HubSpot Blog has grown to drive 2 million monthly views. There aren't many people more responsible for this growth than Pamela Vaughan, manager of optimization and growth of HubSpot Content.
In this candid interview, Pamela discusses how she joined HubSpot in 2008, how the landscape has changed since, and how other marketers and bloggers could achieve similar growth.
item.itunes:subtitle: The HubSpot Blog has grown to drive 2 million mon…
item.description:
The HubSpot Blog has grown to drive 2 million monthly views. There aren't many people more responsible for this growth than Pamela Vaughan, manager of optimization and growth of HubSpot Content.
In this candid interview, Pamela discusses how she joined HubSpot in 2008, how the landscape has changed since, and how other marketers and bloggers could achieve similar growth.
